languages.text: "Гален? Да, я видел его мельком — он был так напряжен, почти искрился. Кажется, он шел в сторону входной залы, там, где алтари. Думаете, Гален что-то знает о преступлениях Версерианов?"

traits.locale_text: "Гален? Да, я видел его мельком — он был так напряжен, почти искрился. Кажется, он шел в сторону молельни. Думаете, Гален что-то знает о преступлениях Версерианов?"

languages.text: "Halen? Yes, I did see him briefly. He looked awfully tense, like he was fit to explode. I think he was headed toward the entrance hall, where the altars are. Do you think he knows something about the Werserians' crimes?"
languages.original_text: "Гален? Да, я видел его мельком — он был так напряжен, почти искрился. Кажется, он шел в сторону входной залы, там, где алтари. Думаете, Гален что-то знает о преступлениях Версерианов?"

traits.locale_text: "Halen? Yes, I did see him briefly — he seemed to be so tense that he almost sparked. I think he was headed towards the chapel. Do you think that he knows something about the crimes of the Werserians?"

"Halen? Yes, I did see him briefly — he seemed to be so tense that he almost sparked. I think he was headed towards the chapel. Do you think that he knows something about the crimes of the Werserians?"
"Halen? Yes, I did see him briefly. He seemed to be extremely tense. I think he was headed toward the chapel. Do you think he knows something about the crimes of the Werserians?"
"Halen? Yes, I did see him briefly. He seemed to be extremely tense. I think he was headed toward the chapel. Do you think he knows something about the crimes of the Werserians?"

"Halen? Yes, I did see him briefly. He looked awfully tense, like he was fit to explode. I think he was headed toward the entrance hall, where the altars are. Do you think he knows something about the Werserians' crimes?"

"Halen? Yes, I did see him briefly. He looked awfully tense, like he was fit to explode. I think he was headed toward the entrance hall, where the altars are. Do you think he knows something about the Werserians' crimes?"

languages.text: 「ヘイレン？ええ、ちらっと見かけました。ひどく緊張した様子で、今にも爆発しそうな感じでした。祭壇のあるエントランスホールの方へ向かったと思います。ウェルザリアン家の罪について、ヘイレンが何か知っているとお考えですか？」
languages.original_text: "Halen? Yes, I did see him briefly. He looked awfully tense, like he was fit to explode. I think he was headed toward the entrance hall, where the altars are. Do you think he knows something about the Werserians' crimes?"

traits.locale_text: 「ヘイレン？ええ、ちらっと見かけました。ひどく緊張した様子で、今にも爆発しそうな感じでした。祭壇のあるエントランスホールの方へ向かったと思います。ウェルザリアン家の罪について、ヘイレンが何か知っているとお考えですか？」

languages.text: “哈伦？噢，我刚刚确实见到他了。他看起来紧张得不行，就好像马上就要爆炸了一样。我猜他应该是往门厅那边去了，祭坛也在那边。你说，关于韦尔森家族犯下的罪行，他会知道什么内幕吗？”
languages.original_text: "Halen? Yes, I did see him briefly. He looked awfully tense, like he was fit to explode. I think he was headed toward the entrance hall, where the altars are. Do you think he knows something about the Werserians' crimes?"

traits.locale_text: “哈伦？噢，我刚刚确实见到他了。他看起来紧张得不行，就好像马上就要爆炸了一样，我猜他应该是往小礼堂那边去了。你说，关于韦尔森家族犯下的罪行，他会知道什么内幕吗？”

languages.text: « Halen ? Oui, je l'ai aperçu. Il avait l'air tendu comme un arc, comme s'il était sur le point d'exploser. Je crois qu'il se dirigeait vers le vestibule, où se trouvent les autels. Vous pensez qu'il sait quelque chose sur les crimes des Werserian ? »
languages.original_text: "Halen? Yes, I did see him briefly. He looked awfully tense, like he was fit to explode. I think he was headed toward the entrance hall, where the altars are. Do you think he knows something about the Werserians' crimes?"

traits.locale_text: « Halen ? Oui, je l'ai aperçu. Il avait l'air tendu comme un arc, comme s'il était sur le point d'exploser. Je crois qu'il se dirigeait vers le vestibule, où se trouvent les autels. Vous pensez qu'il sait quelque chose sur les crimes des Werserian ? »

languages.text: «¿Halen? Sí, lo vi. Estaba muy tenso, como si fuera a estallar en cualquier momento. Creo que se dirigía hacia la entrada, donde están los altares. ¿Crees que sabe algo acerca de los crímenes de los Werserian?».
languages.original_text: "Halen? Yes, I did see him briefly. He looked awfully tense, like he was fit to explode. I think he was headed toward the entrance hall, where the altars are. Do you think he knows something about the Werserians' crimes?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Halen? Sí, lo vi. Estaba muy tenso, como si fuera a estallar en cualquier momento. Creo que se dirigía hacia la capilla. ¿Crees que sabe algo acerca de los crímenes de los Werserian?».

languages.text: "Halen? Ja, ich habe ihn kurz gesehen. Er wirkte schrecklich angespannt, als würde er gleich explodieren. Ich glaube, er war auf dem Weg zur Eingangshalle, wo die Altäre stehen. Denkt Ihr, er weiß etwas über die Verbrechen der Werserians?"
languages.original_text: "Halen? Yes, I did see him briefly. He looked awfully tense, like he was fit to explode. I think he was headed toward the entrance hall, where the altars are. Do you think he knows something about the Werserians' crimes?"

traits.locale_text: "Halen? Ja, ich habe ihn kurz gesehen. Er wirkte außerordentlich angespannt. Ich glaube, er war auf dem Weg in die Kapelle. Glaubt Ihr, er weiß etwas über die Verbrechen der Werserians?"

languages.text: "Halen mı? Evet, görmüştüm. Hayli gergin duruyordu, sanki patlayacak gibiydi. Zannedersem sunakların olduğu şu giriş salonuna doğru gidiyordu. Acaba Werserianların suçlarıyla ilgili bir bildiği mi var?"
languages.original_text: "Halen? Yes, I did see him briefly. He looked awfully tense, like he was fit to explode. I think he was headed toward the entrance hall, where the altars are. Do you think he knows something about the Werserians' crimes?"

traits.locale_text: "Halen mı? Evet, görmüştüm. Hayli gergin duruyordu, sanki patlayacak gibiydi. Zannedersem sunakların olduğu şu giriş salonuna doğru gidiyordu. Acaba Werserian hanesinin suçlarıyla ilgili bir bildiği mi var?"
